body.name: Pipishell Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 42-85 inch Flat Screen LED TV up to 132lbs Swivel Dual Articulating Arms Tilt TV Mount, Tool-Free Tilt TV Bracket Max VESA 600x400mm, Fits 8” 12” 16" Wood Studs
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Pipishell and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 17 hrs 3 mins
features: Wide Compatibility: This Pipishell TV mount is compatible with most 42″–85″ TVs up to 132 lbs with VESA mounting patterns 200x100 to 600x400mm. The TV wall mount can be installed on 8″/12″/16″ wood studs, solid concrete, or brick walls. Please do not mount on drywall alone.

Full Motion Adjustments: This full motion TV mount features enhanced hinges for smoother flexibility. Use the 2.79″–16.54″ extension and +/-45° swivel to redirect the screen toward your position for a more immersive experience. The +5°/-15° tool-free tilt helps to reduce glare from windows or light sources.

Reliable Stability: Designed for maximum durability, our TV mount is engineered with thicker arms to provide solid support for large TVs. Crafted from high-quality steel, this TV wall mount is built to withstand the test of time while securely holding your TV in place.

Hassle-Free Installation: Our wall mount TV bracket includes a drilling template, detailed instructions, and standard mounting hardware for hassle-free setup. The swivel TV wall mount can be leveled +/-3° after installation to ensure perfect TV wall mount positioning.

U.S.-Based Product Support: Our goal is to make sure your TV mount experience lives up to your expectations. That’s why our U.S.-based customer support team is happy to answer questions or address any concerns you may have about TV wall mount installation or product selection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pipishell Full Motion TV Wall Mount | Maximize the Potential of Your Large TV

This Pipishell full motion TV wall mount is an exceptional choice for anyone looking to enhance their entertainment experience. Add flexibility and upgrade the security of your large TV with a robust mounting solution that’s built to last.

The Pipishell TV wall mount includes a drilling template to make TV mount positioning a breeze. Once you determine your wall type, simply mark your locations, drill pilot holes, then mount the arm assembly with confidence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Instructions were perfectly clear. I hung the TV above the fireplace. Everything I needed was in the box, even the anchors to hang into the brick. This product is very well designed, constructed and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased many tv mounts over the last 20 years. I was pleasantly surprised when i opened the box on this one. High guality workmanship and excellent (readable) instructions. Only criticism is the tiny level. Use your own 24in level. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as described
reviews.reviewText: For once, pretty straight forward instructions! Got a big TV this thing can hold it. Very sturdy and solid built not the cheap metal you see from others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Check your stud locations before purchasing
reviews.reviewText: Very good mount and easy to use. Be aware that this mount is only 16" wide! If you are trying to center the mount on a wall you will need to locate your studs to make sure you have 2 studs to screw into or 1 stud near the center of the mount for support. If your studs are not centered where you need them, you should look for a mount that will span 24" in order to accommodate stud location so you can keep your TV centered. Just FYI. This appears to be a very good mount. It is holding our 85" TV nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid Mount, but Measure Before You Buy
reviews.reviewText: I recently installed the Pipishell Full Motion TV Wall Mount for my 85-inch flat-screen TV, and it's fair to say that the product has both its high points and areas that could use improvement. The mount is quite sturdy and holds up well, which is paramount when it comes to the safety and security of large, expensive TVs. The swivel dual articulating arms and the tool-free tilt feature are excellent additions, offering a range of motion and viewing angles that elevate the overall TV-watching experience.However, a word of caution to potential buyers about the backing plate size. The mount comes with a 16-inch backing plate, which was a bit of a letdown for my specific installation needs. I was aiming to have my TV centered between studs and ideally needed a 32-inch backing plate for that perfect alignment. Despite this, I was able to make it work, but it's something I wish I had known beforehand. So, if you're considering this mount, take the time to measure the distance between your studs to ensure that the backing plate will suit your setup.On a positive note, the mount does come with a very helpful template, which aids in getting the installation just right. The inclusion of this template is a thoughtful touch, simplifying the mounting process and helping to achieve precise drilling and alignment.In conclusion, while the Pipishell Full Motion TV Wall Mount is well-built and provides a robust and flexible mounting solution, the backing plate size could be a limitation depending on your wall stud configuration. It's crucial to measure and plan accordingly before purchasing. If the backing plate fits your space, you'll likely be pleased with the durable build and the functional, user-friendly design of this TV mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Arrive as expected, easy to install and pretty sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used for a 65” TV very sturdy and moves every direction with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing wall mount
reviews.reviewText: I do want to say was very impressed with this wall mount. It is little complex to install if you don't have a good drill. But if you do have the right tools it goes into the wood studs like butter. This is a 75" Tv so I needed another person to help mount but once leveled was great
